title: Black Knight

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, you may choose to visit another player. If anyone visits them, transfur one random player that visits them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If your target visits you, transfur them instead.

desc:
Post 2890
*"They appear to have extreme sensitivity towards sound. However, the chemical makeup of the Latex gives them poor eyesight. They seem rather intrigued by moving objects, however." -Dr.█████████, MIT.*
